name: Diviner
proficiencies: Saving Throw: INT +7 | Saving Throw: WIS +4 | Skill: Arcana +7 | Skill: History +7

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
special_abilities.desc: The diviner is a 15th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). The diviner has the following wizard spells prepared:

special_abilities.name: Portent (Recharges after the Diviner Casts a Divination Spell of 1st Level or Higher).
special_abilities.desc: When the diviner or a creature it can see makes an attack roll, a saving throw, or an ability check, the diviner can roll a d20 and choose to use this roll in place of the attack roll, saving throw, or ability check.

actions.name: Quarterstaff.
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d6 – 1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d8 – 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.
